name: app_layout
objective: Check that applications are displayed correctly in the content area
description:
Under the 'Application' tab application must appear in two groups : 
- a first group on the top of the content area which contains the home screen applications
- a second group which contains all the applications

Those two groups must be separated with a thin line as in the reference document.
pre_condition:
- open the homescreen settings panel (user menu -> settings -> gnome-control-center opens -> click on home screen settings icon)
- select the "Applications" tab if needed (should be selected by default)

steps.expected: the favourite applications must appear in the top area
a second group with all available applications must appear in the bottom area
a toolbar with category selection and search field must be present between the two areas

author: sdx

name: apps_mgt1
objective: Check that functionalities of favorite applications are available
description:
A right click on a home screen application (top group) must pop up a small window at the right side of the application icon with the two following functionalities : 
- Remove from Home
- Launch
pre_condition:
- open the homescreen settings panel (user menu -> settings -> gnome-control-center opens -> click on home screen settings icon)
- select the "Applications" tab if needed (should be selected by default) 
- have some favourite applications already installed on desktop

steps.description: right click on a favourite application
steps.expected: a popup menu with "Remove from Home" and "Launch" items must appear

name: find_app
objective: Check that the filter form for the application of the bottom group works
description:
When a string is typed in the search form, a subset of all the available applications must be visible. The displayed results must be consistent with the typed string.

In the same way, when selecting a category from the select list on the left, the listed applications must match the category.
pre_condition:
- open the homescreen settings panel (user menu -> settings -> gnome-control-center opens -> click on home screen settings icon)
- select the "Applications" tab if needed (should be selected by default)

steps.description: type a pattern in the search field of the bottom area
steps.expected: the list of available applications must be updated and match the pattern
the search field must be cleared and the list of applications must match the selected category
